enum: Value "1" represents country's birth registration data are at least 90 per cent complete. "0" represents country's birth registration data are less than 90 per cent complete.
Reference year represents the year of the census conducted.
Value "1" represents country's death registration data are at least 75 per cent complete. "0" represents country's death registration data are less than 75 per cent complete.
Demographic and Social Statistics Branch, United Nations Statistics Division (UNSD), Department of Economic and Social Affairs, United Nations
Demographic and Social Statistics Branch, United Nations Statistics Division (UNSD), Department of Economic and Social Affairs, United Nations.

title: Proporción de países que a) han realizado al menos un censo de población y vivienda en los últimos diez años; y b) han registrado el 100% de los nacimientos y el 80% de las defunciones
